lender.occupational_info: I am a community organizer in the local foods movement in SE Michigan. My main focus is to find and promote opportunities for young people who wish to grow good food. We hope to build many more financial systems and move to 10% local sourcing of our food supply and to share this opportunity with other communities.

lender.occupational_info:
Moonsail is a resource for people who want to take the next step on their learning journey but aren't sure where to start.
We provide self empowerment tool for learning so you can chart your own course and learn at your own pace, to build confidence and knowledge.
Moonsail is developing a series of Easy eGuidesâ¢ and short courses built around technology, design, business and marketing. We also blog about these topics to develop a community of like-minded individuals, all willing to share and learn.

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: EcoSure Pest Control Environmental Responsibility You care about your homeâs environment and so do we. EcoSureâs application methods, products, training and a commitment to the environment separate us from the competition. We do things in a professional manner letting our customers know they can put their trust in us. We promise to take care of your home like it was our own.

lender.name: Mom&Dad
lender.loan_because:
The two people pictured here, by their example, taught me to care, and they taught me to share. Thanks to them, I canât imagine traveling through life any other way.
So, each time I make a Kiva loan, itâs because I so very much want the entrepreneurs' lives and their familiesâ lives to be better. But it's also because, for me, this is but one more way that I can say thank you, again, to my parents, and express my love. I feel their presence in my every act of kindness.
